  • Method Details

    • canSelect

      public boolean canSelect(String playerUsername, int[][] coord)
      Checks if the selected cards are selectable
      Parameters:
      coord - coordinates of the selected cards: coord[x][0] = row coord[x][1] = column
      Returns:
      if the selection is valid

    • removeSelectedCards

      public ArrayList<Card> removeSelectedCards(int[][] coordinates)
      Removes at most three cards from the board
      Parameters:
      coordinates - of the cards to be removed
      Returns:
      the removed cards

    • canInsert

      public boolean canInsert(String playerUsername, int column, int cardNumber)
      Checks if the selected cards can be added to the player's bookshelf
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - of the player who wants to add the cards
      column - where the player wants to insert the cards
      cardNumber - number of cards to insert into the column
      Returns:
      if the insertion is valid

    • addCardsToBookshelf

      public void addCardsToBookshelf(String playerUsername, int column, ArrayList<Card> cards)
      Adds the selected cards into the player's bookshelf
      Parameters:
      playerUsername - player who makes the move
      column - where the selected cards are added
      cards - the previously selected cards

    • isPlayerBookshelfFull

      public boolean isPlayerBookshelfFull(String username)
      Checks is the bookshelf of a given player is full
      Parameters:
      username - player whose bookshelf to check
      Returns:
      if the bookshelf of the player is full

    • checkRefill

      public boolean checkRefill()
      Checks if the board has no more selectable cards
      Returns:
      if every card doesn't have another adjacent card

    • scoreCommonGoal

      public void scoreCommonGoal(String username)
      Checks if a common goal has been achieved by a player
      Parameters:
      username - player whose eventual achievement we want to check

    • scorePrivateGoal

      public void scorePrivateGoal()
      Checks the progress of the private goal achievement of every player

    • orderByScore

      public Scoreboard orderByScore()
      Arranges the players by score
      Returns:
      ordered SerializableTreeMap (username, score)
